omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
	patient_identifier_Value,
	beg_dt_tm,
	end_dt_tm,
	order_detail_display_line,
	lower(rxroute) as rxroute,
	strengthdoseunit,
	strengthdose,
	concept_identifier
from omop_staging.oxford_prescribing
where concept_identifier is not null
order by
	patient_identifier_Value,
	beg_dt_tm,
	end_dt_tm,
	order_detail_display_line,
	rxroute,
	strengthdoseunit,
	strengthdose,
	concept_identifier

omopColumns.name: drug_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Maps concepts to standard valid concepts in the `drug` domain.
